kaltan supar spots 2013 mawuntan sayiklokros papadi wiwrutha pirimi tharagaya jaya ganimata yudha hamudawe gayan janaka wijesinha eeye thissamaharamayedi samath wiya.thissamaharamaye silon otodrom dhawana pathaye ithamath thiyunu muhunuwarakin pawathi me isawwe dewani sthanaya yudha hamudawe di.pi.si.aar.suwarnamal da, thewani sthanaya manoj udayakumara da himi kara gathha.wiwrutha kantha tharagaye jayagrahikawa wuye thissamaharamaye dabliw.pi.ee.aar. dulakshi ya.tharaga aarambhayata pera ‘bayisikal kunatuwa’ lesin handinwunu papadi sayiklon raliyak pawathwini.

dan kagahuwata 2005.11.19 chanda prathipala aawata pasu ee masa 26 mahinda rajapaksha nikuth kala gasat pathraye sandahan wenawa uthura, nangenahira ek kala yuthuyi kiyala. 2006 jawipe shershtadhikaranayata gihin naduwak pawaruwa me sambandhawa.

thawa da withthiye nithignyayanta mulika chodanawanta adala sakshi yali piriksa balimata awasara dima ohu pa්rathikshepa kale, ee ayurin katayuthu kirima sadharana naduwak sandaha kamkaruwanta thibena ayithiya emagin ahirena bawata ihala usawi niyogayak pawa di thibiya di ya.
shanudrith pemwathiyak wuna kiyala dan boho denek dannawa.

thama swamiyage wilapaya asuna balla kan depasata karamin bala sitinnata wiya.
ada sandawe nam ohu mehi awith naha.

ee, ohu ada gangodawila mahesthrath adhikaranayata idiripath kala awasthawediya.
mathake neda, anthimata ithuru wenne?
pera raja dawasa mewani daduwam dimen apeksha kale nithi garuka yukthi garuka yahapath samajayak godanaga ganimaya.
ithin, uthuru nagenahira janathawa da ehema hithuwama waruddak thiye da?

gihani mohan samanga podu rajya mandala wyaparika samuluwata ekwa aththe rajaya samanga nowana athara mohan perera sabhapathithwaya darana rajya nowana wyaparika prawardhana aayathanayakata labuna arayumakata anuwa bawa sakshi sahithawa oppu wanne mema handunumpathe athi wisthara samangini.

rawul gaha kiyanne ithama shakthimath deyaklu.
namuth kalaya samanga mata watahuna nama giya prasiddha, ratata wadadayi deyak karanna puluwan paramadarshi charithayak wenna kiyala thamayi eda thaththa kiwwe kiyala.
upeksha swarnamali pasugiya dineka dinamina puwathpatha samaga pawathwu sammukha sakachchawakadi ayage aadara kathawa athulu boho de heli kala.me in kotas kipayak ...
methanadi api thawath suwisheshi deyak gana hithanna oona.
wisheshayenma mewani parani akunu sannayakawala thambaa thahadu boho wita hamuwanne ingrisi wathu palakayange niwes walaya.
me sare upawasaya bageta nowa thilipan men awasan husma poda yanathek karanne nam manawi.
aapahu yanna wenawa.
